Class BrewingRecipeData

java.lang.Object
me.mehboss.utils.RecipeUtil.Recipe
me.mehboss.utils.data.BrewingRecipeData
public class BrewingRecipeData extends RecipeUtil.Recipe
Specialized recipe type for brewing mechanics. Extends RecipeUtil.Recipe with additional fields and rules required for brewing stand behavior, including ingredient slots, fuel settings, and bottle requirements.

BrewingRecipeData is used when defining custom brewing recipes that require a specific ingredient, fuel item, or bottle type. It also supports enhanced logic such as perfect brewing, custom fuel charge amounts, and optional bottle validation.
